title: Servers
body: Riot needs to get an African Server. I live in South Africa and the best ping i can get is about 170. It would be nice to play with a much lower figure.

replies.body:
Feel free to post this to the [Miscellaneous Boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous), where it can be better tracked and visible. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
